name: A-Frames
description: Experience the beauty of architectural A-frame homes with unique design and cozy interiors.

name: Adapted
description: Find homes that have been creatively adapted from existing structures to offer something extraordinary.

name: Amazing Pools
description: Relax and swim in stunning homes with breathtaking pools that offer a perfect retreat.

name: Amazing Views
description: Enjoy stunning views from your home, whether it's a mountain vista, ocean view, or city skyline.

name: Arctic
description: Live in the cool beauty of the Arctic with properties designed to withstand extreme cold while offering comfort.

name: Barns
description: Rustic barns transformed into beautiful living spaces, combining countryside charm with modern design.

name: Beach
description: Find the perfect beach homes that combine sandy shores and sea breezes for a relaxing stay.

name: Beachfront
description: Live right on the edge of the ocean with beachfront properties offering spectacular views and serene atmospheres.

name: Bed And Breakfasts
description: Cozy bed-and-breakfasts offering warm hospitality and personalized experiences.

name: Boats
description: Live the unique experience of staying on boats, offering a peaceful lifestyle on water.

name: Cabins
description: Escape into the wilderness with charming cabins designed for relaxation and adventure.

name: Campers
description: Enjoy the freedom of the open road with stylish campers that offer comfort on the go.

name: Camping
description: Reconnect with nature by staying in unique camping accommodations that offer both comfort and adventure.

name: Casas Particulares
description: Experience the warmth and charm of local Cuban homes, offering an authentic and intimate stay.

name: Castles
description: Live like royalty in magnificent castles with rich history, stunning architecture, and opulent interiors.

name: Caves
description: Explore the underground beauty of cave homes, offering a cool and natural environment.

name: Chefs Kitchens
description: Cook like a professional with kitchens designed for chefs, featuring state-of-the-art appliances and spacious layouts.

name: Containers
description: Sustainable and creative homes made from shipping containers, offering modern living with a unique flair.

name: Countryside
description: Enjoy the serenity and beauty of the countryside with properties that offer peace and natural surroundings.

name: Creative Spaces
description: Innovative and artistic spaces designed to spark creativity and inspiration, perfect for artists and thinkers.

name: Cycladic Homes
description: Live in the stunning Cycladic homes of Greece, featuring iconic whitewashed walls and blue-domed roofs.

name: Dammusi
description: Discover traditional Sicilian homes known for their unique style and harmonious integration with the landscape.

name: Desert
description: Stay in homes that embrace the beauty and solitude of the desert, offering peace and stunning sunsets.

name: Design
description: Explore homes with cutting-edge designs, featuring sleek lines, modern materials, and stylish interiors.

name: Domes
description: Experience living in dome-shaped homes that provide unique architectural beauty and energy efficiency.

name: Earth Homes
description: Live sustainably in earth homes that blend with nature, providing comfort and energy efficiency.

name: Farms
description: Stay in cozy farmhouses surrounded by nature, offering fresh air, wide open spaces, and rustic charm.

name: Golfing
description: Live near world-class golf courses, with properties offering beautiful views and access to premium golfing.

name: Grand Pianos
description: Indulge in homes with grand pianos, offering an elegant and luxurious ambiance for music lovers.

name: Hanoks
description: Experience the beauty of traditional Korean hanoks, offering serene architecture and a connection to culture.

name: Historical Homes
description: Step back in time with historical homes that feature rich stories, classic architecture, and timeless beauty.

name: Houseboats
description: Live on the water in houseboats that combine the freedom of the ocean with the comfort of a modern home.

name: Islands
description: Escape to private islands where you can enjoy ultimate peace, stunning landscapes, and complete isolation.

name: Lake
description: Stay in lakefront homes offering tranquil views of the water, ideal for relaxation and water-based activities.

name: Lakefront
description: Experience the beauty of lakefront properties that offer direct access to peaceful waters and stunning scenery.

name: Luxe
description: Indulge in luxury with homes that offer high-end amenities, exquisite design, and ultimate comfort.

name: Mansions
description: Live in grand mansions offering opulence, expansive space, and unparalleled luxury.

name: Minsus
description: Stay in traditional Korean minsus, offering authentic experiences with simple charm and deep cultural connections.

name: National Parks
description: Stay near national parks with properties offering easy access to hiking, wildlife, and natural beauty.

name: New
description: Discover the latest, most innovative homes with modern amenities and cutting-edge designs.

name: Off The Grid
description: Experience life off the grid with homes designed for self-sufficiency and complete detachment from city life.

name: OMG
description: Stay in homes that will leave you in awe, featuring jaw-dropping designs, architecture, and surroundings.

name: Play
description: Homes designed for play and adventure, offering fun features and exciting atmospheres.

name: Riads
description: Stay in Moroccan riads with stunning courtyards, exotic decor, and an immersive cultural experience.

name: Rooms
description: Explore unique rooms designed for relaxation, creativity, and peace.

name: Ryokans
description: Experience the tranquil elegance of Japanese ryokans, offering serene rooms, tatami mats, and traditional hospitality.

name: Shepherds Huts
description: Stay in quaint shepherds' huts for a cozy and rustic getaway surrounded by nature.

name: Skiing
description: Stay in ski resorts or mountain cabins perfect for those who enjoy skiing and winter sports.

name: Skin In Out
description: Homes with luxurious outdoor living spaces that bring the outdoors inside for ultimate relaxation.

name: Surfing
description: Live near some of the best surfing spots in the world, with homes offering easy access to the waves.

name: Tiny Homes
description: Enjoy a minimalist lifestyle with tiny homes that offer everything you need in a compact and efficient design.

name: Top Cities
description: Stay in prime city locations, offering luxury, convenience, and access to urban amenities.

name: Top Of The World
description: Live high up in the mountains, with homes offering stunning panoramic views and a sense of elevation.

name: Towers
description: Experience staying in towers with dramatic views, offering a sense of height and grandeur.

name: Tree Houses
description: Stay in magical tree houses, nestled high in the trees for a unique, immersive experience with nature.

name: Trending
description: Explore the latest and most popular home trends, from design innovations to unique experiences.

name: Tropical
description: Stay in tropical homes surrounded by lush greenery, offering warm weather and exotic beauty.

name: Vineyards
description: Stay in stunning homes located amidst beautiful vineyards, perfect for wine lovers looking for a scenic getaway.

name: Trulli
description: Discover the charm of traditional Trulli houses, iconic stone dwellings from the southern regions of Italy, offering a unique stay experience.

name: Windsurfing
description: Explore the thrilling world of windsurfing with homes located near the best beaches for windsurfing enthusiasts.

name: Yurts
description: Experience a cozy and unique stay in a traditional yurt, a portable home perfect for those seeking an off-the-grid experience.
